snippet.title: 0 Day for VR
snippet.description:
Get 0 Day Now on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/554920/

Right now the build is focused on the FPS mechanics at a discounted price. We will be adding numerous game modes including, RTS, factions, Competitive Mode, and more with focus on customer feedback and ideas. Join us in making this game the best it can be! :)
